original_text: For as touching the ministering to the saints, it is superfluous for me to write to you:
korean_text: 성도를 섬기는 일에 대하여는 내가 너희에게 쓸 필요가 없나니

sentences.original_text: For as touching the ministering to saints,
it is superfluous for me to write to you:
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희에게 쓰는 것이 필요 없으나
